tool_description:
Simple web service which return some burmese calendar data.
All calculations for data are based on Myanmar Standard Time("UTC +6:30").
name: Burmese(Myanmar) Calendar Date
title: Burmese(Myanmar) Calendar Date

api_list.name: Burmese Calendar Data
api_list.description: Return some Burmese calendar data as json.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
English = 1
Myanmar Unicode = 2 is default.
Mahar Thingyan (Myanmar New Year) data are return in English as default.
